stories.title: Configure Exam Methodology
stories.goal: configure different exam methodologies (CAT, LOFT, Linear) through a single interface
stories.benefit: deploy new exam types without requiring code changes

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the admin dashboard, when I create a new exam profile, then I can select from available methodologies (CAT, LOFT, Linear, Section-Adaptive)
Given a CAT exam profile, when I configure scoring parameters, then I can set IRT model type, theta bounds, and stopping criteria
Given a configured exam profile, when the system loads it, then the correct strategy is dynamically applied without restart

stories.title: Add New Exam Type
stories.goal: add a new exam type by creating a strategy class
stories.benefit: extend the platform without modifying core engine code

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the strategy interface, when I implement a new scoring strategy, then it can be registered and used by exam profiles
Given a new strategy class, when I deploy it, then existing exams continue to work unchanged

stories.title: Resume Interrupted Exam
stories.goal: resume an exam that was interrupted
stories.benefit: continue from where I left off without losing progress

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given an active exam session that was interrupted, when I return and authenticate, then I see the option to resume my exam
Given a resumed session, when I continue, then my previous answers, current question, and remaining time are restored
Given a session interruption, when the system saves state, then it completes within 2 seconds

stories.title: Navigate Exam Questions
stories.goal: navigate between questions according to the exam's rules
stories.benefit: review and change answers when permitted by the exam type

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a linear exam with review enabled, when I complete a question, then I can go back to previous questions
Given a CAT exam, when I answer a question, then I cannot go back (forward-only navigation)
Given a section-adaptive exam, when I finish a section, then I cannot return to that section

stories.title: Store Flexible Question Content
stories.goal: create questions with varied content structures
stories.benefit: support different question types and domains without schema changes

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the question editor, when I create a multiple-choice question, then I can add text, images, and formatted content
Given the question editor, when I create a SATA question, then I can specify multiple correct answers
Given the database, when questions are stored, then they use JSONB allowing schema flexibility

stories.title: Tag Questions Hierarchically
stories.goal: organize questions using a hierarchical tag system
stories.benefit: easily find and reuse questions across different exams

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a question, when I add tags, then I can select from a hierarchical taxonomy tree
Given a tagged question, when I search by parent tag, then all questions with child tags are also returned
Given the tag tree, when I add a new tag category, then it can be nested up to 5 levels deep

stories.title: Manage Psychometric Parameters
stories.goal: set and update psychometric parameters for questions
stories.benefit: ensure accurate adaptive scoring using calibrated item parameters

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a question, when I edit it, then I can set difficulty (beta), discrimination (alpha), and guessing (gamma) parameters
Given psychometric data from calibration, when I import it, then parameters are updated in bulk
Given a question without parameters, when used in CAT, then default values are applied with a warning

stories.title: Generate Questions with AI
stories.goal: use AI to generate draft questions
stories.benefit: accelerate question bank development

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the content authoring interface, when I provide a topic and parameters, then AI generates draft questions
Given AI-generated questions, when created, then they are marked as DRAFT status
Given AI generation, when I review output, then I can edit, accept, or reject each question

stories.title: Approve Draft Questions
stories.goal: review and approve draft questions through a workflow
stories.benefit: ensure all published questions meet quality standards

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a draft question, when I submit for review, then it moves to PENDING_REVIEW status
Given a pending question, when a reviewer approves it, then it moves to ACTIVE status
Given an active question, when I need to retire it, then it moves to RETIRED status and is excluded from new exams

stories.title: View Learning Gaps
stories.goal: see where my ability stands compared to the target
stories.benefit: understand what I need to improve to pass the exam

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my dashboard, when I view gap analysis, then I see my current theta vs target theta
Given gap analysis, when displayed, then topics where I'm below target are highlighted
Given topic gaps, when I click on one, then I see specific weak areas within that topic

stories.title: Predict Readiness Date
stories.goal: know when I'll be ready to pass the exam
stories.benefit: plan my study schedule and exam date effectively

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my progress history, when I view predictions, then I see an estimated readiness date
Given my improvement velocity, when calculated, then the readiness date adjusts based on my learning rate
Given insufficient data, when prediction is unavailable, then I see a message explaining why

stories.title: Get Personalized Study Tasks
stories.goal: receive targeted study recommendations
stories.benefit: focus my study time on areas that need the most improvement

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my performance data, when I request recommendations, then I receive prioritized study tasks
Given study tasks, when displayed, then they link to relevant practice questions or content
Given completed tasks, when I mark them done, then my recommendations update accordingly

stories.title: Implement Scoring Strategy
stories.goal: add new scoring algorithms using the strategy pattern
stories.benefit: extend scoring capabilities without modifying core code

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the scoring service, when I implement a new strategy, then it follows the defined interface
Given multiple strategies, when an exam selects one, then only that strategy is invoked
Given a strategy implementation, when I deploy it, then unit tests verify correct behavior

stories.title: Call Scoring Service
stories.goal: call the scoring service through a defined API
stories.benefit: integrate scoring independently from content management

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the API gateway, when I call the scoring endpoint, then it routes to the scoring service
Given a scoring request, when processed, then the response includes theta estimate and standard error
Given service versioning, when APIs change, then old versions remain available during transition

stories.title: Receive Next Question Quickly
stories.goal: receive the next adaptive question without noticeable delay
stories.benefit: have a smooth testing experience without frustrating waits

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I submit an answer, when the next question loads, then it appears within 200ms (P95)
Given high load, when 1000 concurrent users submit answers, then P95 latency remains under 200ms
Given question pre-fetching, when I'm answering, then the next likely question is cached

stories.title: Scale During Peak Periods
stories.goal: handle large numbers of concurrent test-takers
stories.benefit: ensure all students can test during high-demand periods

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given Kubernetes deployment, when load increases, then pods auto-scale horizontally
Given 10,000 concurrent sessions, when all are active, then system performance remains stable
Given load decrease, when traffic drops, then pods scale down to save resources

stories.title: Control Item Exposure
stories.goal: prevent individual questions from being overexposed
stories.benefit: maintain test security and item validity

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given item selection, when choosing next question, then exposure control limits are applied
Given exposure statistics, when I review them, then I see usage rates per item
Given overexposed items, when limits are reached, then they are temporarily excluded from selection

stories.title: Prevent Question Harvesting
stories.goal: detect and prevent attempts to collect questions
stories.benefit: protect the question bank from theft

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given API requests, when rate limits are exceeded, then further requests are blocked
Given unusual patterns, when detected, then an alert is triggered for review
Given a blocked user, when they attempt access, then they see a security notice

stories.title: Review Audit Logs
stories.goal: review complete logs of test-taker actions
stories.benefit: investigate suspicious behavior and defend score validity

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given a completed exam, when I view audit logs, then I see all actions with timestamps
Given audit logs, when stored, then they are immutable and tamper-evident
Given audit requirements, when querying logs, then I can filter by session, user, or time range

stories.title: Ensure Exam Results Persist
stories.goal: trust that my exam results are safely stored
stories.benefit: know my results won't be lost due to technical issues

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given exam completion, when results are saved, then they use database transactions
Given a network failure during save, when connection is restored, then the save completes
Given saved results, when queried, then they are consistent and complete

stories.title: View Progress Dashboard
stories.goal: see my overall learning progress in one place
stories.benefit: stay motivated and track my improvement over time

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my dashboard, when I log in, then I see progress charts showing ability trends
Given multiple exams taken, when displayed, then I see historical results and comparisons
Given topic proficiency, when visualized, then I see a breakdown by subject area

stories.title: Review Post-Exam Analytics
stories.goal: understand my performance immediately after an exam
stories.benefit: identify strengths and weaknesses while the experience is fresh

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given exam completion, when results display, then I see overall score and percentile
Given post-exam analytics, when viewing, then I see topic-wise performance breakdown
Given time data, when displayed, then I see average time per question and outliers
Given previous attempts, when compared, then I see improvement or regression by topic

stories.title: Get Study Time Recommendations
stories.goal: know how much time to spend on each topic
stories.benefit: allocate my limited study time effectively

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my performance gaps, when I view recommendations, then I see estimated hours per topic
Given prioritized topics, when displayed, then they are ordered by impact on overall score
Given a target exam date, when I set it, then recommendations adjust to fit the timeline

stories.title: Take Topic-Focused Practice Exam
stories.goal: practice questions from specific weak topics
stories.benefit: improve targeted areas before the full exam

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my dashboard, when I select a weak topic, then I can start a focused practice exam
Given a topic exam, when I complete it, then I see topic-specific analytics
Given topic practice history, when reviewed, then I see improvement trends for that topic

stories.title: Schedule Exam Intelligently
stories.goal: know the best date to take my exam
stories.benefit: maximize my chances of passing by testing when ready

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given my current proficiency, when I request scheduling help, then I see a suggested exam date
Given a target score, when I set it, then the suggested date accounts for the gap
Given my study velocity, when calculated, then the prediction uses my historical learning rate

stories.title: Manage Questions in Admin Dashboard
stories.goal: efficiently manage the question bank
stories.benefit: maintain high-quality, organized question content

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the admin dashboard, when I access questions, then I can add, edit, and delete them
Given bulk operations, when I import questions, then I can use CSV or JSON formats
Given search and filter, when I query, then I can find questions by topic, difficulty, or status
Given question preview, when I test rendering, then I see exactly what test-takers will see

stories.title: Organize Question Banks
stories.goal: organize questions into logical banks and categories
stories.benefit: efficiently reuse content across multiple exam types

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the admin dashboard, when I create a question bank, then I can assign categories and metadata
Given a question, when I assign it, then it can belong to multiple banks
Given bank statistics, when I view them, then I see question counts and coverage metrics

stories.title: Browse Exam Catalog
stories.goal: discover and explore available exams
stories.benefit: find the right exam for my certification goals

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the platform homepage, when I browse exams, then I see a catalog with categories
Given the catalog, when I filter by exam type or price, then results update accordingly
Given an exam listing, when I click it, then I see details including sample questions
Given search, when I type a query, then relevant exams are shown with highlighted matches

stories.title: Subscribe to Exam Plans
stories.goal: subscribe to access multiple exams
stories.benefit: get better value with bundled exam access

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given subscription plans, when I view them, then I see Basic, Premium, and Unlimited tiers
Given plan selection, when I subscribe, then payment is processed via Stripe
Given an active subscription, when I access exams, then included exams are unlocked
Given subscription management, when I upgrade or cancel, then changes take effect immediately

stories.title: Purchase Individual Exams
stories.goal: buy a single exam without subscribing
stories.benefit: pay only for what I need

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given an exam listing, when I click purchase, then I can complete checkout with Stripe
Given a completed purchase, when confirmed, then I have permanent access to that exam
Given my purchase history, when I view it, then I see all purchased exams and receipts
Given exam bundles, when available, then I can purchase multiple exams at a discount

stories.title: Use Mobile App
stories.goal: access exams and analytics on my phone
stories.benefit: study anywhere, anytime

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given the mobile app, when I log in, then I see my dashboard and available exams
Given an exam on mobile, when I take it, then the experience is optimized for touch
Given offline mode, when enabled, then I can take cached exams without internet
Given push notifications, when enabled, then I receive study reminders

stories.title: Sync Progress Across Devices
stories.goal: access my progress from any device
stories.benefit: seamlessly switch between devices without losing work

acceptanceCriteria.description: Given I start an exam on web, when I open the mobile app, then I can continue from where I left off
Given progress updates, when synced, then changes appear across devices within 5 seconds
Given offline changes, when I reconnect, then they sync automatically without data loss
Given concurrent edits, when conflicts occur, then the most recent change wins with notification
